title: Fort Washington Park: Fishing
body: Fishing         A large carp from the Potomac. NPS  To fish at Fort Washington Park you must possess a Maryland Tidal Sport Fishing License. below are some helpful links: Maryland Fishing Guide 2012  Maryland Fish Facts  Tidal Fishing Regulations  Potomac River Fisheries Commission  Size Limits and Seasons NOAA Weather  Â      A Longnose from the Potomac River.
